title: An Amish Home
description: Come for a visit to Karsten Field with this Biblically inspired story of home and family.An Amish Home begins almost ten years after Allan Howarth was set free. When his Amish journey began, he never imagined where it would lead. Together with his wife Mary, they have two young children, Benjamin and Ruth.Allan might have thought he finished raising children with his oldest, Brett and Alice. He discovers a new world of amazement and challenges in his Amish Home.As the family faces a flood, a drought and several of lifeâ€™s mysteries, they are carried through by their faith.Not until a precious life hangs in the balance, does Allan face the ultimate test of his faith.
author: George Michael Loughmueller
